snippet.title: Book Review: How to Talk to Girls
snippet.description: Novelty book good for a few chuckles.

snippet.title: Jen: How I Managed to Shirk (Almost) All My Responsibilities
snippet.description: Ever have a period of your life where you felt completely overwhelmed? Of course you have! Haven't we all? It was just one such period of time that I learned -- the hard way -- to relax some of those obligations.

snippet.title: Gift Rehab: How to Get What You Want This Valentine's Day
snippet.description: That perfect Valentine's Day gift that seems so obvious to you is likely not so obvious to your partner. Find out how to steer him in the right direction to get what you really want this year.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: How to Lose Friends & Alienate People
snippet.description: Snarky comedy about celeb culture lacks bite.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
snippet.description: Battle of the sexes romcom with mature content.

snippet.title: How to Wrap a Present
snippet.description: Want to wrap presents like a professional? This step-by-step process for wrapping presents will ensure your Christmas gifts are presented perfectly every time.

snippet.title: Television Review: How Not to Decorate
snippet.description: Snide UK designers turn garish into gorgeous.

snippet.title: Television Review: How to Make It in America
snippet.description: Mature drama adds grit to the pursuit of a glamorous life.

snippet.title: Book Review: How to Draw Pokemon: Gotta Catch 'Em All!
snippet.description: This is not the way to teach drawing.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: How to Deal
snippet.description: Even Moore fans may find this hard to deal with.
